mapper.select: select exc.exclassid, exc.exclassname from exclass exc join exclass_organization eo on exc.exclassid = eo.exclassid join organization o on o.id = eo.organizationid join user u on u.organization_id = o.id where u.id = #{userid}

select exclassid, exclassname, -1 as pid from exclass union select o.id as exclassid, o.name as exclassname, exc.exclassid as pid from organization o join exclass_organization eo on o.id = eo.organizationid join exclass exc on exc.exclassid = eo.exclassid
